title: Long-term performance of hydrogen-bromine flow batteries using single-layered and multi-layered wire-electrospun SPEEK/PFSA/PVDF membranes
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01670F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sanaz Abbasi, Yohanes Antonius Hugo, Zandrie Borneman, Wiebrand Kout, Kitty Nijmeijer
The wire-electrospun layer arrangement and composition of dense SPEEK/PFSA/PVDF membranes for long-term hydrogen-bromine flow battery operation is investigated to ensure durable performance with <50% PFSA utilization and ≤60 μm membrane thickness.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
